casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Randy Lee SELLARS. No. 547A05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 8, 2009. Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, for Sellars. Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of December 2008 by State of NC to Amend the Record:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of January 2009."
